name: Next.js shadcn/ui Toggle
description: Toggle button with pressed state styles.

files.template: 'use client'; export function Toggle(){ const [on,setOn]=React.useState(false); return (<button onClick={()=>setOn(v=>!v)} className={'px-3 py-1 border rounded '+(on?'bg-black text-white':'')}>{on?'On':'Off'}</button>); }
import React from 'react'; import { Toggle } from '../components/ui/toggle'; export default function Page(){ return <main className='p-6'><Toggle/></main>; }
